data.oai_dc:dc: Conservation planning and ecosystem modelling data

Marxan and Marxan with Zones conservation planning software files and Ecospace model output files (Marxan software and associated manuals freely available from: http://www.uq.edu.au/marxan/). Ecopath, Ecosim and Ecospace models and supporting technical documentation on parameterisation available on request from Cefas and Ifremer (Ecopath, Ecosim and Ecospace input data, composition of functional groups and model parameters included with online supporting information associated with publication).
Ecopath with Ecosim|Ecospace|marine spatial zoning|marine trophic index|Marxan|Marxan with Zones|systematic conservation planning
